name: NextStep
description: NextStep is a career counseling platform offering personalized services like counseling sessions, resume reviews, and feedback tools. It features user authentication, protected routes, and a responsive design for seamless browsing on all devices.
features: Includes one-on-one counseling, resume reviews, and actionable feedback.
Protects user data with advanced authentication features and ensures safe access.
Seamless browsing experience across desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
Offers feedback forms, progress trackers, and dynamic content updates.
Intuitive design with well-organized sections and quick access to services.
Provides guides, tips, and resources for interview preparation and skill-building.

name: EquiSports
description: EquiSports is an online store for sports equipment, allowing customers to browse, purchase, and review products. It features user authentication, dynamic product management, and responsive design with a light/dark theme toggle.
features: Secure user login and registration using email/password or third-party authentication (Google).
Dynamically fetch, post, and update products in the store using MongoDB.
Fully responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop views.
Users can add, update, and delete their own equipment in the system.
Users can toggle between dark and light themes.
Allows customers to leave ratings and reviews for products they purchase.
